title: Smoking A Bowl With Swag in SoBe
itunes:title: Smoking A Bowl With Swag in SoBe
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority we celebrate International Pipe Smoking Day… Join the boys as they light up a pipe and smoke a bowl while discussing the history of this tradition.

In the second third of the show we will light up a discontinued cigar that was part of The Cigar Authority Care Package… The Swag SoBe from Aging Room cigars…

Join us for all the madness on The Cigar Authority…
